original_text: If you put dirt in a well, its good water becomes bad. It is the same with a righteous person who agrees to do wicked things.
korean_text: 의인이 악인 앞에 굴복하는 것은 우물이 흐려짐과 샘이 더러워짐과 같으니라

sentences.original_text: If you put dirt in a well
It is the same with a righteous person
who agrees to do wicked things
